scripts.data-class: aws dynamodb --profile story-serverless --region eu-west-2 batch-write-item --request-items file://data/class.json
scripts.data-user: aws dynamodb --profile story-serverless --region eu-west-2 batch-write-item --request-items file://data/user.json
scripts.data-teacher: aws dynamodb --profile story-serverless --region eu-west-2 batch-write-item --request-items file://data/teacher.json
scripts.data-course: aws dynamodb --profile story-serverless --region eu-west-2 batch-write-item --request-items file://data/course.json
scripts.data: npm run data-class && npm run data-teacher && npm run data-user && npm run data-course
